The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 November is 934,099 (1,659.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 October, there were 129,137 new confirmed cases (229.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 October, there were 126,718 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% ( 2,419 extra cases).
